title: Women in the years 1790 to 1810 - role

content.prompt: Which of the following is a correct statement about women in United States society in the years 1790–1810 ?

choices.label: They were considered critical to educating good republican citizens.
They owned a large share of the nation’s property.
They entered professional occupations such as medicine and law in large numbers.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
